001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.strategy;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
004import java.security.SecureRandom;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Random;
007
008/**
009 * Utility class for applying different selection strategies to a list of elements.
010 *
011 * <p>This class provides methods to retrieve elements based on predefined selection strategies,
012 * such as random selection, first element selection, and last element selection.
013 *
014 * <p>These methods are primarily used in UI components that allow multiple selections,
015 * enabling automation frameworks to define element selection dynamically.
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019public class StrategyGenerator {
020
021   private static final SecureRandom RANDOM = new SecureRandom(); // shared instance
022
023
024   private StrategyGenerator() {
025   }
026
027   /**
028    * Selects and returns a random element from the given list.
029    *
030    * @param elements The list of {@link SmartWebElement} from which an element is to be selected.
031    * @return A randomly selected {@link SmartWebElement} from the list.
032    * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the list is null or empty.
033    */
034   public static SmartWebElement getRandomElementFromElements(List<SmartWebElement> elements) {
035      validateInput(elements);
036      return elements.get(RANDOM.nextInt(elements.size()));
037   }
038
039   /**
040    * Selects and returns the first element from the given list.
041    *
042    * @param elements The list of {@link SmartWebElement} from which the first element is to be selected.
043    * @return The first {@link SmartWebElement} in the list.
044    * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the list is null or empty.
045    */
046   public static SmartWebElement getFirstElementFromElements(List<SmartWebElement> elements) {
047      validateInput(elements);
048      return elements.get(0);
049   }
050
051   /**
052    * Selects and returns the last element from the given list.
053    *
054    * @param elements The list of {@link SmartWebElement} from which the last element is to be selected.
055    * @return The last {@link SmartWebElement} in the list.
056    * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the list is null or empty.
057    */
058   public static SmartWebElement getLastElementFromElements(List<SmartWebElement> elements) {
059      validateInput(elements);
060      return elements.get(elements.size() - 1);
061   }
062
063   /**
064    * Validates that the input list is not null or empty.
065    *
066    * @param elements The list to validate.
067    * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the list is null or empty.
068    */
069   private static void validateInput(List<SmartWebElement> elements) {
070      if (elements == null || elements.isEmpty()) {
071         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Element list must not be null or empty.");
072      }
073   }
074}
